level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: This chapter applies to a collaborative law participation agreement that meets the requirements of ยง 16-4004 signed on or after the effective date of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-125, see notes under ยง 16-4001.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 3 of the Uniform Collaborative Law Act. See Vol. 7 , Part 1B, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
